title: Scale your SEO content marketing automatically with this top-rated $39 app
description:
If you run a business, you want to do everything you can to get the word out about your products and services. But that’s not the easiest thing to do if you’re not a marketing expert. So rather than hire a marketing team or contractor, save money by generating your own SEO content with Juice.ai.

Juice.ai uses a powerful AI model to generate 100% unique, SEO-optimized content to drive organic traffic to your landing pages. The simple tool gives you relevant SEO keywords in your dashboard and is optimized to generate up to 25 SEO-optimized articles at a time. You could essentially scale your content without spending hours tweaking each article.

In addition, with WordPress and Shopify integrations, you can publish content directly to your website, while section regeneration makes it easy to update and revise articles over time.

Juice has earned 4.8/5 stars on G2 and 4.5/5 stars on Capterra because it revolutionizes how small business owners can scale their content marketing. Right now, you can get a lifetime subscription to a Juice.ai Pilot Plan for just $39 — a fraction of what you’d pay to outsource production.

 

Juice.ai Pilot: Lifetime Subscription – $39

Scale Your SEO Content

Prices subject to change.

Marketing, Marketing Software

title: This video tool makes sharing, collaborating, and more easier
description:
While remote work has offered many benefits, it has had many drawbacks, too. Fortunately, there’s a lot of tech working to address the cons of remote work, including VideoCom Apps Pro, which you can get for $49.

VideoCom is a complete video tool that makes it easier to create and share videos with your team. Whether you’re doing updates, reports, tutorials, presentations, or practically anything else, VideoCom is a singular platform for video creation, sharing, hosting, and analytics.

With this offer on a lifetime license, you’ll have access to two VideoCom apps — Capture and Presenter — as well as 25GB of VideoCom Cloud storage. With Presenter, you can record presentations while adding overlays, annotations, and much more to give your videos an extra boost. Capture allows you to create more simple screen recordings with audio and annotations. You’ll also get media analytics and simple sharing tools to understand who is watching your videos and how they’re engaging with them.

Make remote collaboration and information sharing easier. Right now, you can get a lifetime subscription to VideoCom Apps Pro for 89% off $480 at just $49.

 

VideoCom Apps Pro: Lifetime Subscription – $49

Sharpen Your Video Conferences

Prices subject to change.

Video Editors, Videos
